title: Inspiring Words: Love's Journey
description: "Inspiring Words: Love's Journey" is all about love -- new love, love grown old, or love that stands the test of time -- and all the events that life throws at it. It tells the story of the truth about cheating and knowing, and the pain, choices and decisions we all make when we are in love and when time has taken its toll on love.  The first book in the "Inspiring Words" poetry series by Julianna M Dawson, "Love's Journey" invites readers and book club groups to explore their own personal love journeys through discussion questions and ideas provided at the end of the book.
author: Julianna Marie Dawson
